mapper.insert: INSERT INTO guest ( gst_id, gst_pw, gst_name, gst_email, gst_gender, gst_birth, gst_phone, gst_type, post_no, address, reg_time, mod_time, reg_id, mod_id, use_yn ) VALUES( #{gstId}, SHA2(#{gstPw}, 256), #{gstName}, #{gstEmail}, #{gstGender}, #{gstBirth}, #{gstPhone}, (SELECT cd FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A003' AND cd = 'C'), #{postNo}, #{address}, NOW(), NOW(), #{gstId}, #{gstId}, (SELECT cd FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A002' AND cd = 'Y') )
mapper.select: SELECT gst_id gstId, gst_pw gstPw, gst_name gstName, gst_email gstEmail, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A001' AND cd = gst_gender) gstGender, gst_birth gstBirth, gst_phone gstPhone, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A003' AND cd = gst_type) gstType, post_no postNo, address, DATE_FORMAT(g.contract_start, '%Y-%m-%d') contractStart, DATE_FORMAT(g.contract_end, '%Y-%m-%d') contractEnd, g.room_no roomNo, room_amenity roomAmenity, resident_note residentNote, protector_name protectorName, protector_phone protectorPhone, protector_relation protectorRelation, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'C004' AND cd = r.room_type) roomType, r.room_dong roomDong, r.room_ho roomHo FROM guest g LEFT JOIN room r ON g.room_no = r.room_no WHERE g.gst_id = #{gstId}
mapper.update: UPDATE guest SET gst_name = #{gstName}, gst_phone = #{gstPhone}, post_no = #{postNo}, address = #{address}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_time = NOW() WHERE gst_id = #{gstId}
mapper.select: SELECT v.vol_content volContent, v.vol_people volPeople, DATE_FORMAT(v.vol_starttime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') volStartTime, DATE_FORMAT(v.vol_endtime, '%H:%i') volEndTime, va.vol_app_no volAppNo, va.vol_no volNo, va.gst_id gstId, va.vol_app_people volAppPeople, va.vol_app_comment volAppComment, (SELECT cd_nm FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'W003' AND cd = va.vol_app_state) volAppState FROM volunteer_application va INNER JOIN volunteer v ON va.vol_no = v.vol_no WHERE va.gst_id = #{gstId} AND va.use_yn = (SELECT cd FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A002' AND cd = 'Y') AND v.use_yn = (SELECT cd FROM common_code WHERE crp_cd = 'A002' AND cd = 'Y') ORDER BY va.reg_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE guest SET gst_pw = SHA2(#{newPw}, 256), mod_time = NOW(), mod_id = #{gstId} WHERE gst_id = #{gstId} AND gst_pw = SHA2(#{oldPw}, 256)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO old_pw_history (old_pw_no, user_no, user_part, old_pw, reg_id, reg_time, mod_id, mod_time, use_yn) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(5), #{gstId}, 'GST', SHA2(#{oldPw}, 256), #{gstId}, NOW(), #{gstId}, NOW(), 'N')

INSERT INTO old_pw_history (old_pw_no, user_no, user_part, old_pw, reg_id, reg_time, mod_id, mod_time, use_yn) VALUES (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(5), #{gstId}, 'GST', (SELECT gst_pw FROM guest WHERE gst_id = #{gstId}), #{gstId}, NOW(), #{gstId}, NOW(), 'N')
